title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 345.1 - Objectives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 345.1 - Objectives

State Regulations

To provide for the distribution of State aid to county
probation services and to the probation services of New York City and to
provide State financial assistance to local governments for regular and/or
specialized probation programming to promote offender accountability, rehabilitation, and enhance public safety. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
345.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
